responses: Axolotls are carnivores, meaning they only eat meat

patterns: What is the length of an Axolotl
To what length do they grow?
responses: Axolotls grow to about 25 cm which is about 10 inches
Axolotls are a critically endangered species. Ecologists estimate that fewer than 1000 exist in the wild.

patterns: In which part of the world do they live
Where can I see wild axolotl?
responses: The only place in the world that has wild Axolotls is Lake Xohimilco within Mexico City.

patterns: Is there a fin on an Axolotls body
responses: Axolotls have a fin that extends from the back of the head to the tip of the tail.
